title: Sex For $ale
overview: Dick Smothers Jr. Co-stars (as "himself") in this witty comic relief sex fest that shows the "true" face of the porn industry as a job. Dick, a Production Assistant trying to break into the industry as a "leading" man actor, finally gets his chance when pampered porn star Evan Stone (as "himself") breaks the cardinal rule and falls in love with his leading lady Jessica Drake (as "herself"), and refuses to do a non-condom scene. Dick steps in at the last minute and "Smothers" Donna Marie (as "herself") like a veteran star!
